poem:
### The New Dark Age

In the glow of digital rage,  
a tale twists sharper, darker.  
Words morph, fueled by  
machines that hum violence.  
Voices of women crack  
like old vinyl under the needle,  
spinning in endless loops,  
while silence prowls offline,  
waiting to leap,  
fangs ready  
to bite  
the real.
